name: part_010
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら生誕祭2025】生誕3D LIVE！FEVER！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [uB6GxHc7PRc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song '集結の園へ' (Shuuketsu no Sono e) by Usada Pekora, Houshou Marine, Shirogane Noel, and Shiranui Flare.

subtitles.original: ...いゆく
subtitles.english: ...fading away

subtitles.original: 夢なら 果てなく
subtitles.english: If it's a dream, endlessly

subtitles.original: それなら 涙は
subtitles.english: Then, the tears

subtitles.original: どこへと 帰らん
subtitles.english: Where will they return?

subtitles.original: 集結の園へ
subtitles.english: Toward the Gathering Garden

subtitles.original: 作詞：MEGUMI 作曲：たかはしごう
subtitles.english: Lyrics: MEGUMI, Composition: Go Takahashi

subtitles.original: 仕組まれている 集結さえも
subtitles.english: Everything is orchestrated, even this gathering

subtitles.original: 求め過ぎてた答えならば
subtitles.english: If it is the answer we have sought too much

subtitles.original: 記号の中で 泳ぎ疲れて
subtitles.english: Tired of swimming within the symbols

subtitles.original: 行き着く先は ただの仮初め
subtitles.english: The destination is just a transient place

subtitles.original: 長い時 離れても
subtitles.english: Even if separated for a long time,

subtitles.original: 知っている
subtitles.english: I know

subtitles.original: 必ず呼び合う 絆を
subtitles.english: The bond that always draws us together

subtitles.original: 運命と呼ぶ事
subtitles.english: Is called 'destiny'

subtitles.original: 抱いて 抱きしめても抜け出せない
subtitles.english: Hold me; even if I embrace you, I can't escape

subtitles.original: 定められた境から
subtitles.english: From the destined boundary

subtitles.original: 溶けて なくなるほどの進化へと
subtitles.english: Towards an evolution that melts and disappears

subtitles.original: おかえりなさい
subtitles.english: Welcome home

subtitles.original: 白い結晶が ふりそそぐ都市
subtitles.english: In the city where white crystals fall

subtitles.original: 全ては包まれるだけ
subtitles.english: Everything is simply being enveloped

subtitles.original: 誰が 決めた訳でもない夢を
subtitles.english: To the dream that no one ever decided upon

subtitles.original: おかえりなさい
subtitles.english: Welcome home

subtitles.original: 心のままに
subtitles.english: As your heart desires

subtitles.original: 君の瞳に 映るその影
subtitles.english: The shadow reflected in your eyes

subtitles.original: 何を思って 何を見てる
subtitles.english: What are you thinking? What are you seeing?

subtitles.original: 感じる事に 信じる事に
subtitles.english: About feeling, and about believing,

subtitles.original: 委ねる事に 臆病になる
subtitles.english: And about surrendering, I grow cowardly

subtitles.original: 長い時 待っていた
subtitles.english: I have waited for a long time

subtitles.original: 微笑んで 支えになりましょう
subtitles.english: Let me smile and be your support

subtitles.original: 一人で 空に願うのなら
subtitles.english: If you pray to the sky alone

subtitles.original: いつか 繰り返す命の出口
subtitles.english: One day, the exit of life that repeats

subtitles.original: さらにその先の道も
subtitles.english: And the road beyond it

subtitles.original: きっと 出会えると信じて泣こう
subtitles.english: Believing we'll surely meet, let's weep

subtitles.original: おやすみなさい
subtitles.english: Good night

subtitles.original: 赤い血潮が 渦巻く波間
subtitles.english: In the waves where red blood swirls

subtitles.original: 寄せては返す営み
subtitles.english: The cycle of ebbing and flowing

subtitles.original: 愛し 愛され 一つになるまで
subtitles.english: Until we love, are loved, and become one

subtitles.original: おやすみなさい
subtitles.english: Good night

subtitles.original: 時は満ちるから
subtitles.english: For time will be fulfilled

subtitles.original: 長い時 離れても 知っている
subtitles.english: Even if separated for a long time, I know

subtitles.original: 必ず呼び合う 絆を
subtitles.english: The bond that always draws us together

subtitles.original: 運命と呼ぶ事
subtitles.english: Is called 'destiny'

subtitles.original: 抱いて 抱きしめても抜け出せない
subtitles.english: Hold me; even if I embrace you, I can't escape

subtitles.original: 定められた境から
subtitles.english: From the destined boundary

subtitles.original: 溶けて なくなるほどの進化へと
subtitles.english: Towards an evolution that melts and disappears

subtitles.original: おかえりなさい
subtitles.english: Welcome home

subtitles.original: 白い結晶が ふりそそぐ都市
subtitles.english: In the city where white crystals fall

subtitles.original: 全ては包まれるだけ
subtitles.english: Everything is simply being enveloped

subtitles.original: 誰が 決めた訳でもない夢を
subtitles.english: To the dream that no one ever decided upon

subtitles.original: おかえりなさい
subtitles.english: Welcome home

subtitles.original: 心のままに
subtitles.english: As your heart desires

subtitles.original: 望むままに
subtitles.english: As you wish

subtitles.english: As your heart desires
